#summary Provides mask template files to assist in manufacturing.

= Introduction =

For our experiments, the mask was cut out using a laser cutter. This laser cutter accepted Corel drawings as input. If anyone has created a drawing that was used by another laser cutter, it would be appreciated if they could add it to this page in case other people want to use it.

= Templates =

  * [http://dl.dropbox.com/u/28723659/grid.pdf 4x6,20mm Mask (PDF)]
  * [http://dl.dropbox.com/u/28723659/thermalMask.cdr 4x6,20mm Mask (CDR)]
